evidence.text: JIMMY: Got a kid that wants someone who knows Russian.
JIMMY: Gentlemen, please meet Ani. She'll take care of you tonight. Let me know if you need anything.

JIMMY: What? We just gave you New Year's.
ANI: Jesus Christ Jimmy. When I'm getting health insurance, worker's comp and a fucking 401k, you can tell me when I work and not work.
ANI: Um, I don't know what you're talking about, but anyway I'm not taking any more shifts this week.
